archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Choose Product Offering Purchase Price
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Choose a price for the product offering that is being purchased if more than one can be chosen.

properties.value: Choose Product Offering Purchase Price chooses a price for the product offering that is being purchased if more than one can be chosen. If the price is based on one or more configurable features/properties the features/properties selected are provided to the Product Configuration process. A price associated with a product offering may be overridden by a party with the authority to do so. The price may be dependent on a policy or a policy may determine another price to apply to the product offering or some other product offering. For example, viewing more than a defined number of videos may result in a free view for a family member. Policies are defined when the product offering is developed.
